title: Create Halftime Show Highlights
description: During a live game, a broadcast producer needs to quickly create a highlight package of the first half to air during halftime.

tasks.description: Access the log of all significant plays from the first half.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a time-coded list of all major plays.

tasks.description: Use the log to automatically generate video clips of the top 5 plays.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's tool creates five short video clips.

tasks.description: Assemble the clips into a highlight package with transitions and background music.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete, ready-to-air highlight video.

tasks.description: Send the final package to the master control room for broadcast.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers the video file to the broadcast system.
